chapter.title: Running the Example
chapter.para: To try the example application a Google Talk account and client is needed, refer to the Google Talk website for instructions.

important.para: To exchange messages, the Google Talk account needs to add the Google Talk Bot account in its buddy list. The Google Talk Bot account is mobicents.gtalk.bot@gmail.com.

chapter.para: Once Google Talk is fully setup and running, start &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE and once the service is activated the Hi, I'm online too! message should popup, as depicted in the image below.
At this point messages can be exchanged, sending time will get a reply with the system time, and sending hello will get a 5 chars in message ... reply, as depicted in the image below.
